title: American Sociological Review - Judges as Party Animals: Retirement Timing by Federal Judges and Party Control of Judicial Appointments
itunes:title: American Sociological Review - Judges as Party Animals: Retirement Timing by Federal Judges and Party Control of Judicial Appointments
description: Author Ross M. Stolzenberg discusses his article, "Judges as Party Animals: Retirement Timing by Federal Judges and Party Control of Judicial Appointments," published in the August 2022 issue of American Sociological Review.
content:encoded: Author Ross M. Stolzenberg discusses his article, "Judges as Party Animals: Retirement Timing by Federal Judges and Party Control of Judicial Appointments," published in the August 2022 issue of American Sociological Review.
